TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class NumericShaper : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.IO.ISerializable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NumericShaper extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.IO.ISerializable, class System.IDisposable
type NumericShaper = class inherit Object interface ISerializable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: The NumericShaper class is used to convert Latin-1 (European) digits to other Unicode decimal digits.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns a Set representing all the Unicode ranges in this NumericShaper that will be shaped.
